channel.title: My posts on JCionx's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in My posts on JCionx's Blog

item.title: Blog
item.description: Hello there! I just added a few thing to things to this blog, and now the experience is much better. I added Google Analytics to the site, so I can keep up with this blog’s popularity. I also added a favicon, and I’m trying to apply a few changes to this theme, since code blocks are kind of broken. Tomorow I will keep updating this blog. See you tomorow!

item.title: htmlOS
item.description: Hello there! I am currently developing htmlOS! htmlOS is supposedly an operating system made entirely with HTML, CSS and JavaScript. I made a simple function that allows windows to be spawned in the HTML’s body. Then I decided to make a taskbar, a menu, and some apps. Now there are even notifications, APIs, and an App Store. The usage of the API is simple. Open the settings app inside htmlOS, and use the copy code button.
